actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Credit.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Credit and Rural Electrification

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into commitments to guarantee or insure authorized loans in the full amount provided by law for such loans.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to require the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into commitments to guarantee or insure authorized loans in the full amount provided by law for such loans.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into commitments to guarantee or insure authorized loans in the full amount provided by law for such loans.
